name: Silent Scope EX
overview:
A light gun game from Konami. You play the role of a sniper who takes out terrorists with his rifle.

This game uses a completely new cabinet than its prequels, Silent Scope and Dark Silhouette: Silent Scope 2, with "specially shielded speakers" to surround the player in the game's sounds. Two machines can be linked up to allow cooperative or competitive play for two players. The "EX" in the title is short for "Extreme." Sogeki is the Japanese version of Silent Scope EX.
